TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit XmlnsDictionary extends System.Object implements class System.Collections.ICollection, class System.Collections.IDictionary, class System.Collections.IEnumerable, class System.Xaml.IXamlNamespaceResolver
Public Class XmlnsDictionary Implements IDictionary, IXamlNamespaceResolver
public ref class XmlnsDictionary : System::Collections::IDictionary, System::Xaml::IXamlNamespaceResolver

summary.span: 表示包含 WPF 中 XAML 命名空间的 xmlns 映射的字典。

span.span: Represents a dictionary that contains xmlns mappings for XAML namespaces in WPF.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 将 XAML 命名空间前缀映射到完整的 XAML 命名空间 URI。 maps XAML namespace prefixes to the complete XAML namespace URI. 对于应用程序中的 XAML 用法，通常的 XAML 命名空间 URI 通常不是架构样式 URI，其中包含`http://`。For XAML usage in applications and XAML namespaces in general, the URI is often not a schema-style URI that includes `http://`. 相反，它将用户定义映射到 CLR 命名空间和程序集。It is instead a user-defined mapping to a CLR namespace and assembly. 程序集包含后备类型所引用。That assembly contains the backing types being referred to. 有关详细信息，请参阅[XAML 命名空间和 Namespace 映射为 WPF XAML](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/xaml-namespaces-and-namespace-mapping-for-wpf-xaml.md)。For details, see [XAML Namespaces and Namespace Mapping for WPF XAML](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/xaml-namespaces-and-namespace-mapping-for-wpf-xaml.md). 添加 XAML 命名空间范围内的概念。The adds the concept of scope for a XAML namespace. 默认可能包含前缀密钥和 XML 命名空间 URI 值。A default might contain prefix keys and XML namespace URI values. 中的作用域概念中指，可能会重新定义前缀的 XML 概念。The scope concept in parallels the XML concept that a prefix might be redefined. 如果是这样，重新定义仅适用该级别或下面的 （在 DOM 中的高级别适用的先前定义） 的 XML DOM 视图中。If so, the redefinition only applies at that level or below in a DOM view of the XML (the previous definition applies at higher level in the DOM). 作用域概念主要抽象中API，例如，你可以调用 Api 如而无需担心作用域。The scope concept is mostly abstracted away in the API, such that you can call APIs such as without being concerned about scope. 但是，确实公开了和以便自定义更改作用域的实现可以同步的作用域。However, does expose and so that a custom implementation that changes scope can synchronize with the scope for the .

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance string DefaultNamespace() cil managed

summary.span: 查找与默认 XAML 命名空间对应的 XAML 命名空间。

span.span: Looks up the XAML namespace that corresponds to the default XAML namespace.

returns.span: 如果存在与默认 XML 命名空间对应的命名空间，则为该命名空间；否则为 。

span.span: The namespace that corresponds to the default XML namespace if one exists; otherwise, .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 从映射的角度，默认 XML 命名空间是映射到空字符串的 XML 命名空间。From a mapping perspective, the default XML namespace is the XML namespace that is mapped to empty string. 在 WPF XAML 分析的应用程序的用途，作用的默认命名空间标识符是[!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_wpfxmlnsv1](~/includes/tlasharptla-wpfxmlnsv1-md.md)]，但该此 API 不显式返回值。In WPF XAML parsing for application purposes, the acting default namespace identifier is [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_wpfxmlnsv1](~/includes/tlasharptla-wpfxmlnsv1-md.md)], but that value is not explicitly returned by this API.

The dictionary enumerator for this dictionary.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此 API 存在，以便派生的类可以获取一个枚举器其中的 XML 命名空间的应用范围概念报告为字典枚举数的维度。This API exists so that derived classes can obtain an enumerator where the scoping concept for the XML namespaces is reported as a dimension of the dictionary enumerator.
